resources.string: "This app can damage your device! Many apps won\'t work when moved to another location and they might appear to be uninstalled then! The app does not offer a way to move these apps back if that happens!\nMake a system backup before using this app! Only continue if you really know what you\'re doing!"
"I understand the risk and act on my own responsibility. Do not show this dialog again."
Your device seems not to be rooted! This app requires root access and does not work without. Click [here] to uninstall.
No root access granted - click here to recheck
BusyBox not found Click here to download
Use at your own risk! I won\'t take responsibility for damages on your device! Make a backup first!
Please reboot your device before moving this app again
seems to be an encrypted app and therefore might not be convertible to a system app! Continue at your own risk!
